index.userAlert: We'll be publishing our first texts soon. {0} for an account if you want to be notified.
index.projectAlert: We'll be publishing our first texts soon. To receive an email notification make sure that you have chosen to receive project updates in your user account. {0}
index.introBlurb: Welcome to the CJHNT research platform! All of our texts, both the commentaries produced in the project and the early Jewish texts that they depend on, will be published here. We will also have advanced search functionality to allow you to do your own research on our corpus. To use the platform you will need to {0}. During the registration process you can also sign up to receive updates about new texts and new functionality.

qumranZeichenerklärung.title: Sigla
qumranZeichenerklärung.row2: gap in the text of an indeterminate length
qumranZeichenerklärung.row6: corrected in the manuscript by a scribe to א
qumranZeichenerklärung.row7: secondarily inserted in the manuscript by a scribe
qumranZeichenerklärung.row9: remains of character that cannot be clearly interpreted
qumranZeichenerklärung.row12: variant inserted by a scribe above a character
qumranZeichenerklärung.row15: modern alternative reading of a letter
qumranZeichenerklärung.row16: modern alternative reading of a word
qumranZeichenerklärung.row17: phonemic representation of a base form
qumranZeichenerklärung.row25: marks a lemma in the lemma list as a reference to another lemma. Clicking on such a lemma will load the article of the referenced lemma. Lemmas with an '*' may either be a different spelling of the main lemma, part of a compound name, or indicate a lemma that has no article of its own due to lack of evidence, but is a subject of discussion in the lemma to which it is linked.

privacy.logFilesP1: This web-site creates and uses log files to store data that comes from the user's browser. These data are: the browser type and version, the user's operating system, referrer URL (the page from which the user came) and the time of the server request.
privacy.logFilesP2: These data contain no personal data from the user. The data are required to display the online offerings to the user. These data are never combined with data from other sources. The data are deleted after an anonymous, statisical analysis.
privacy.cookiesP1: This web-site uses browser cookies. These are text files that are stored on the user's computer when visiting the site. They may either be used only once or over a longer period depending on the users browser settings. Certain functionality on this site is only possible because of these cookies. The text files contiain no personal information and are never combined with data from other sources.
privacy.cookiesP2: You can stop your browser from storing these cookies by changing your browser settings. But then not all functionality will be available.
privacy.userTrackingP1: This website uses Matomo, an open-source software package, for statistical analysis of web-site usage. Matomo does not use cookies on our web-site to gather and analyze this data. This information about site usage is saved on the provider's server in Germany. The user's IP-address is anonymized by Matomo.

translation.notAllowed: You are not authorized to edit translations.
